name: my-digital-garden-content
description: My personal digital garden - a collection of notes, thoughts, and ideas

scripts.dev: echo 'No dev server needed for static content'
scripts.build: mkdir -p public && find . -name "*.md" -not -path "./node_modules/*" -not -path "./.git/*" -not -path "./public/*" -exec cp --parents {} public/ \; || echo 'No markdown files found'
